signature.instructions: Classify adverse events into specific categories.

fields.prefix: Reasoning: Let's think step by step in order to

fields.description: One of: Gastrointestinal disorders, Pancreatitis, Hepatobiliary (gallbladder) disease, Hypoglycemia, Eye disorders (Diabetic retinopathy complications), Renal events (Acute kidney injury), Hypersensitivity, Injection-site reactions, Cardiovascular signs, Peri-procedural aspiration risk, Gastrointestinal disorders (Gastroparesis)
